title-group.article-title: Odd Perfect Numbers Have a Prime Factor Exceeding 10⁸

abstract.p: Jenkins in 2003 showed that every odd perfect number is divisible by a prime exceeding 10⁷. Using the properties of cyclotomic polynomials, we improve this result to show that every perfect number is divisible by a prime exceeding 10⁸.
